( 

The group has a photo space ( https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/Nihon=
tostudy/photos/albums=C2=A0 ) and I have added a new album for uploading bu=
t all I get is 'sorry an error has occurred' when I try to upload a photo.=
=C2=A0 This, assume, has to do with who can and can not post photos.=C2=A0=
=C2=A0 Perhaps I am just to new a member.=C2=A0=C2=A0 Can anyone who has be=
en a member for some time post photos?=C2=A0=C2=A0 The latest photos I saw =
were from 2013.=C2=A0=C2=A0 Perhaps it is just some new security concern.

=
Dennis

=C2=A0 I am re-shuffling my stuff and came up with an old tsuba that I thin=
k is early Aizu Ju Shoami.=C2=A0=C2=A0 It us signed, round, iron, and has g=
old inlayed lines.=C2=A0=C2=A0 I can post photos or contact directly.=C2=A0=
=C2=A0 I will probably sell this piece as it at 3 1/8 inch diameter is a bi=
t small for the 1860s sword I had intended it for.=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 Dennis=
